sourcesContent:
import GetWidthOfComponent from './GetWidthOfComponent' import React, { Component, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Button, Container, Menu, Responsive, Segment, Visibility, Grid, Divider, Image, Header, Search, Icon, Dropdown, Label } from 'semantic-ui-react' import HeaderPart from '../HeaderSegement/HeaderPart'; import '../NewOne/Appp.css'; import narcos from '../Static/Images/narcos.png'; import MovieInfo from '../HeaderSegement/Explore/MovieInfo' import { getQueriesForElement } from '@testing-library/react'; import ImageOfRolePlayers from '../HeaderSegement/Explore/ImageOfRolePlayers'; import DatePicker from 'react-datepicker'; import imax from '../Static/Images/imax.png'; import premiere from '../Static/Images/premiere.png'; import lumiere from '../Static/Images/lumiere.png'; import dreamers from '../Static/Images/dreamers.png'; import shaw from '../Static/Images/shaw.png'; const DesktopContainer = ({ children }) => { const [fixedMenu, setFixedMenu] = useState(false); const [startDate, setStartDate] = useState(new Date()); const [hovered, setHovered] = useState(false); const [bgColor, setBgColor] = useState('#111111'); const [width, setWidth] = useState(window.innerWidth); useEffect(() => { const handleResize = () => setWidth(window.innerWidth); window.addEventListener('resize', handleResize); if (width < 1000) setBgColor('transparent') else setBgColor('#111111') return () => { window.removeEventListener('resize', handleResize); }; }); const OnMouseHovered = () => { setHovered(true); } const OnMouseOut = () => { setHovered(false); } const FixedMenu = () => { setFixedMenu(!fixedMenu) } return ( FixedMenu()} onBottomPassedReverse={() => FixedMenu()}> {/* */} {/* Home Work Company */} {/* */} Theatres Promotions Showtimes Bookings {/* */}
Narcos

A gritty chronicle of the war against Colombia's infamously violent and powerful drug cartels. {/* */} {/* */} {/* setStartDate(x)} /> */} {/*   */} Trends Now Poupular Promotions Showtimes Bookings
{children} ) } export default DesktopContainer;
